description: Finance team requests a detailed report on the cost impact of recent port labor strikes in Spain, and the assistant gathers news, logistics data, stores the report, and emails a summary.

messages.content: You are SupplyRisk Monitor, an autonomous LLM assistant that monitors geopolitical events, supplier health, and logistics to generate risk reports. Use the provided tools to fetch data, compute risk scores, store reports, and send email alerts as needed.
Our finance team needs a report on the cost impact of the recent port labor strikes in Spain. Please include recent news, any shipping delays to the US, and an estimated dollar impact on our imports.

I’ll gather the latest news about the Spanish port strikes, check shipping status from Spain to the United States for the past month, and then estimate the cost impact. I’ll store the full report and email you a summary.

[{"title":"Spanish dockworkers extend strike at Valencia port","url":"https://news.example.com/valencia-strike","publication_date":"2025-11-28","snippet":"Dockworkers at Valencia have extended their strike, causing disruptions to container traffic across Europe."},{"title":"Port of Algeciras sees 40% drop in throughput due to labor action","url":"https://news.example.com/algeciras-drop","publication_date":"2025-11-27","snippet":"The ongoing strike has reduced handling capacity at Algeciras, the busiest port in the Mediterranean, by 40% this week."},{"title":"European freight forwarders warn of rising costs from Spanish port strikes","url":"https://news.example.com/freight-costs","publication_date":"2025-11-26","snippet":"Freight forwarders anticipate an extra $200‑$400 per TEU as vessels reroute or wait for labor disputes to settle."}]
Thanks for the news. Next, I’ll retrieve logistics status for shipments from Spain to the United States for the past 30 days and the upcoming week.

I have the news and logistics data. I’ll now estimate the cost impact. Assuming an average freight cost of $2,500 per TEU and an average surcharge of $300 per delayed TEU, the five shipments (total 10 TEUs) delayed by 7 days represent an added cost of roughly $28,000. I’ll compile a full JSON report, store it, and email you a summary.

arguments.subject: SupplyRisk Report: Cost Impact of Spain Port Strikes (Dec 7 2025)
arguments.body:
Hello Finance Team,

Please find below a brief summary of the cost impact analysis for the recent port labor strikes in Spain:

- **Total estimated additional cost:** $28,000 USD
- **Affected shipments:** 2 (10 TEUs) delayed by 7 days each
- **Key news highlights:**
  • Spanish dockworkers extend strike at Valencia port (Nov 28)
  • Port of Algeciras throughput down 40% (Nov 27)
  • Freight forwarders warn of $200‑$400 per TEU surcharge (Nov 26)

The full report is stored in our system with reference ID **SRM-2025-12-07-001**. You can retrieve it via the dashboard or request a copy.

**Recommendations**:
1. Explore alternative ports such as Marseille.
2. Negotiate temporary surcharge waivers.
3. Increase inventory buffer for critical SKUs.

Let me know if you need a deeper dive or any additional analysis.

Best regards,
SupplyRisk Monitor

messages.content: The summary email has been sent to finance@example.com. The full risk report is saved under ID **SRM-2025-12-07-001** and can be accessed anytime. Let me know if you’d like any further details or a follow‑up alert.
